name: Sale Run!
description:
Did you ever wondered how many products you can buy in one run? And how your first decision can affect you whole shopping frenzy? Every shelve that falls over, every amazing product you can't afford! 
Make good decisions and do precise moves, but, the outcome is still impossible to predict. Total mayhem with crazy SALES! 

In Sales Run you can try your best skills in finding best offers, just as a warm up before Black Friday.

Getting crazy when we see all those promotions, aren't we!?

Whole game is based on physics, except few menu items;) 

 

Here's how you collect products !

Team: Mateusz Kołodziejczyk(@Mouzone), Jan Gąbka (@Wexah)
